name: Zombie Ride Share
description:
Even in the post-apocalyptic future of 20XX people need to be extracted from the infested zones with the convenience and low-cost service that they deserve with a personalized rideshare.

That is the promise of Zombie Ride Share. We will get you out of your city overrun by the infected.

Before your driver arrives, you must collect as many supplies and rescue as many survivors as you can. Will you be able to make it to the pickup zone in time for your driver to get you? Will your base survive? Try now to find out.

Instructions:

- MOVE: Click left mouse button and drag

- COLLECT: Scrap metal

- GO TO: the landing zone when your driver arrives.


To get a free game and stay up to date with my latest games, be sure to subscribe to my mailing list.
